title: Systems Engineer
work: Developed and maintained billing application for a healthcare client using Angular, Spring Boot and PLSQL to review treatment details, coverage changes, claim overrides, etc.
Facilitated communication between Patient Registration and Inventory Management services using Apache Kafka
Devised automated jobs and PLSQL procedures for claims processing and coverage discrepancy resolutions
Engineered and delivered three robust frameworks, two UI and one functional, resulting in 5 universally reusable UI components throughout the application, and implemented unit testing with Jasmine
Contributed to a 14% increase in profit during the year 2022-2023

title: Computer Networks Teaching Assistant
work: Assisted in enhancing the coursework, curriculum and the subject material for Computer Networks course
Facilitated project demos, graded assignments and taught classes on HTTP protocols, DNS servers, TCP/UDP and CDN
Guided a class of 50 students in implementing a proxy server, DNS server and a server cache in Python and C++
